---
title: "Creativity in Design"
---

## Overview

A collaboration with City St George focusing on exploring creative design approaches to urban nature spaces and developing innovative solutions for biodiversity conservation in urban environments.

## Objectives

- Integrate design thinking with ecological research
- Develop creative solutions for urban biodiversity challenges
- Foster interdisciplinary collaboration between design and ecology
- Create innovative approaches to public engagement with nature
